name: Pinball 3D Dream Island
description:
Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive Pinball 3D Dream Island game.
Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.
Pinball 3D Dream Island is a type of classic pinball game which uses flipper to guide the steel ball all over the pinball table.

- Use left and right buttons to activate flippers.
- You can miss the ball only 3 times. Be careful!

There are special missions which offer up to three times the score which include the octopus mission where you have to guide the ball
into the octopus’s mouth and there is a shrimp mission as well.
